channel.title: ~*~ReApAgE sCaPe v2~*~
channel.description:
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/317/zamagokxu6.png[/img] [b]DOWNLOAD LINK IS AT BOTTOM OF THE PAGE ;P[/b] [size=10pt]REAPAGE SCAPE v2[/size]
[b]THIS SERVER AND SOURCE WAS MADE BY REAPER X!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b] [b]THIS SERVER AND SOURCE WAS MADE BY REAPER X!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b] [b]THIS SERVER AND SOURCE WAS MADE BY REAPER X!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b] [b]THIS SERVER AND SOURCE WAS MADE BY REAPER X!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b]
DECIDED TO REMAKE THE TOPIC FOR ANYONE WHO WANTED TO PLAY THE SERVER OR ANYONE WHO WANTED THE SOURCE [b]I know some of you have been waiting for this for a while. Me telling you its coming out, so and so, ladeedah. Well its finally here. Reapage Scape V2, left put V1 out of league. There are many updates, and some are pretty unique I'd say. I worked pretty hard on this, and the road to V2 was pretty crazy, with me not being able to connect to mopar and all. In the end it was all worth it.[/b]
[font=Verdana][b]Heres the Leech/rep/post announcement. I know some of you, if not most of you will completely ignore this, but hey at least i tried. For the sake of everyone complaining about leeching, I would just like to say that posting this source is automatically on the leeching list if i like it or not. This goes for every other source on moparscape. People are gonna leech, what can you do. As for the rep, do so if you think its a nice source. Don't just blow of the creators existence completely. And posting... well if you entered this thread, just post some criticism about it. How much time will it take out of your life. And remember to be critical and not rude.[/b][/font]
So, Reapage Scape V2. It has all of the V1 features, plus a whole lot more. I've added a whole new skills area, and new ways to training the skills. There is now a system of "pk rewards". after a certain amount of pk points you can go to the rewards shop at ::pkbox and buy better armor and weapons. codes and commands are more crisp, meaning theres less "WTFS?" when your playing. And the thing I'm most proud of is the training area. There are tons of new monsters to train on, that drop a wide variety of items. There is three levels of training, and every level has better monster drops. But, words are boring, so lets go to the pics.
I know, i know, i have some old pics from V1 on here, but its just the features that i haven't changed that you guys might want to know are in here. I'll take the time out later to update them or something. (even though updating them isn't needed)
*~Portals~* [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/4k8xno.jpg[/img]
*~Shops~* [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/ztzva8.jpg[/img]
*~New Skills Area~* [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/mlqt04.jpg[/img]
Fishing [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2i0doux.jpg[/img]
Herblore & Farming [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/8x5stg.jpg[/img]
Mining & Smithing [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/eplic4.jpg[/img]
Crafting [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/33w34ef.jpg[/img]
Agility [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/jjpkpe.jpg[/img]
Runecrafting [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/143kqgx.jpg[/img]
*~New Training Area~* [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2rcu4ae.jpg[/img]
I made every level in my new training require certain levels
Requirements For Levels [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/10z1r88.jpg[/img] (edited and cropped to view all of it)
Everything requires certain levels because in the V2 release the items dropped by the monsters in the levels get better as the level of the training gets higher. Requiring Skill to get into the training levels gives you something to work at while you are working there... If you know what i mean.
Also Notice that it says "At least ONE of the following" on the requirements of each level. I made it to where you only need one of the skills or that certain combat level at the level asked, because getting all of them to get to one level isn't worth it.
Level One Training Start with bank.
New Monsters! Level One
Gets harder as you get further
Level 1 Boss I suppose
Every Level has a higher level monster that will attack automatically, Level One has that zombie. After That zombie is the gate to Level Two training. (check requirements picture to view whats needed)
Level Two Rock Crab
Entrance to LEVEL 3
(check requirements picture to see whats needed.)
You need 25m to enter the third and final training level. There is a lot of useful and new items in level three, so i decided to make you guys pay. And it will help balance out the economy.
Everything outside of the banking area of Level three will automatically attack you withing 3 squares of range. Level 120-159 Zombies and Shades
Bosses of Level 3!We have: [b] *~Slayer~*
*~Barrows~*
*~Dragons~*
*~MB~*
*~Team Capes~*
*~PK Box~*[/b]
Heres the Commands List.
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/11ts6mq.jpg[/img]
[b]**CREDITS**[/b] Allstarscape for putting his V2 source up here for my use. SilabSoft so i have a client to use. Moparscape for letting me host this. Jagex for everything we've used from you. 99str99 for the glows. Hi Hiyascape for your help with ideas. And all of you for your support on V1. Reaper X- This is his server Well that about wraps it up. If you think I'm missing anything, please tell me. Hopefully no one has anything against a long thread o.O. Just head out and download this now
~!~DOWNLOAD~!~
Uppit - http://uppit.com/B9NJ9Q
FileFront - http://files.filefront.com/Reapage+Scape+V2rar/;11486301;/fileinfo.html
[i] [b]Both New, with no "virus" or whatever they said.[/b][/i]
[size=10pt]Have Fun :][/size]
[b]Server made by Reaper X!!![/b] [b]Server made by Reaper X!!![/b] [b]Server made by Reaper X!!![/b]
